text: BiqShajAqvitiq tasmA$d brAhmaqNEna# BEShaqjaM na kAqrya#mapU#tOq hyE$(1q)ShO# &mEqddhyO yO BiqShaktau ba#hiShpavamAqnEna# pavayiqtvA tAByA#-mEqtamA$Sviqna-ma#gRuhNaqn tasmA$d bahiShpavamAqnE stuqta A$SviqnO gRu#hyatEq tasmA#dEqvaM ~MviqduShA# bahiShpavamAqna u#paqsadya#H paqvitraqM ~Mvai ba#hiShpavamAqna AqtmAna#mEqva pa#vayatEq tayO$&strEqdhA BaiSha#jyaqM ~Mvi nya#dadhuraqgnau tRutI#yamaqPsu tRutI#yaM brAhmaqNE tRutI#yaqM tasmA#dudapAqtra- [  ] 38
